API Reference
=============

This section contains the API documentation for stackit's modules.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   core
   controls
   sfsymbol
   utils
   delegate

Core Modules
------------

* :doc:`core` - StackApp, StackMenuItem, and StackView classes
* :doc:`controls` - UI control creation functions
* :doc:`sfsymbol` - SF Symbol support
* :doc:`utils` - Utility functions (alerts, notifications, timers)
* :doc:`delegate` - Application delegate for lifecycle management
